name: NOVANationalNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Updated throughout the day - it's news on demand with the all things you need to know. If it's making headlines, we've got you covered.

After enabling the skill, you can say things like “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s my news?” to hear your flash briefing. To hear Nova News first, make sure you go to “Settings” in your Alexa app, tap on “Flash Briefing”, select “edit order” and move Nova News to the top.

Other ways you can request your Nova flash briefing are:

"Alexa, what's the news?"
"Alexa, what's news?"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
